title: Honor Level 3
body: I just hit honor level 3 and I have 0 idea what it does. Can someone be nice enough to explain it to me? {{champion:222}}

replies.body:
Now that you're at Honor Rank 3, you'll have the chance to start earning Honor Capsules every one and awhile instead of a key fragment. Honor capsules don't need a key to open, guarantee a couple keys inside, as well as the chance to get champion shard or even the Grey Warwick or Medieval Twitch skins! 

You can always check out the full details on our [**Honor FAQ**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor)!
